body:
@chuckatkins @srekolam 

I still want to test this a little more, but this converts the mesa dep to gl. So far I have confirmed that this will build all of the rocm packages.

Is there anything here that I may be missing? The key piece here is allowing building with `mesa+llvm` where the `libllvm` provider is `llvm-amdgpu`.

`gl@4.5:` is used because `gl@4.5` was what was provided by `mesa18`.
title: HIP: Change mesa dep to gl
